languages.text: "Первый ткач стар. Его обитель находится в храме под грузовой магистралью, и он уже много десятилетий не покидал нижние отсеки — даже краткое путешествие способно исторгнуть дух из его древнего тела".

"The First Spinner is old. His abode is in the temple beneath the flagship's freight line, and he has not left the lower decks in decades. Even a short journey could sunder the spirit from his ancient body."
languages.original_text: "Первый ткач стар. Его обитель находится в храме под грузовой магистралью, и он уже много десятилетий не покидал нижние отсеки — даже краткое путешествие способно исторгнуть дух из его древнего тела".

traits.locale_text: "The First Spinner is old. His abode is at the temple beneath the flagship's freight line, and he has not left the lower decks in decades. Even a short journey could sunder the spirit from his ancient body."
"The first weaver is old. He has not left the lower bays for decades. Even a short journey may pluck the spirit out of his ancient body."

"The First Spinner is old. His abode is by the temple beneath the flagship's freight line, and he has not left the lower decks in decades. Even a short journey could sunder the spirit from his ancient body."
"The First Weaver is old. He has not left the lower decks in decades. Even a short journey could sunder the spirit from his ancient body."

"The First Spinner is old. His abode is in the temple beneath the flagship's freight line, and he has not left the lower decks in decades. Even a short journey could sunder the spirit from his ancient body."

"The First Spinner is old. His abode is at the temple beneath the flagship's freight line, and he has not left the lower decks in decades. Even a short journey could sunder the spirit from his ancient body."

"The First Spinner is old. His abode is by the temple beneath the flagship's freight line, and he has not left the lower decks in decades. Even a short journey could sunder the spirit from his ancient body."

languages.text: « Le premier tisseur est d'un âge avancé. Ses quartiers se trouvent dans le temple aménagé sous la ligne de fret du vaisseau amiral, et il n'a pas quitté les ponts inférieurs depuis plusieurs décennies. Même un trajet aussi court risque de séparer son esprit de son corps fatigué. »
languages.original_text: "The First Spinner is old. His abode is in the temple beneath the flagship's freight line, and he has not left the lower decks in decades. Even a short journey could sunder the spirit from his ancient body."

traits.locale_text: « Le premier tisseur est d'un âge avancé. Ses quartiers se trouvent dans le temple aménagé sous la ligne de fret du vaisseau amiral, et il n'a pas quitté les ponts inférieurs depuis plusieurs décennies. Même un trajet aussi court risque de séparer son esprit de son corps fatigué. »
« Le premier tisseur est d'un âge avancé. Il n'a pas quitté les ponts inférieurs depuis des décennies. Même un trajet aussi court risque de séparer son esprit de son corps fatigué. »

languages.text: «El Primer Tejedor es muy anciano. Su vivienda se halla en el templo que hay bajo la línea de carga de la nave insignia, y no ha abandonado las cubiertas inferiores en décadas. Incluso un breve viaje podría separar su espíritu de su cuerpo centenario».
languages.original_text: "The First Spinner is old. His abode is in the temple beneath the flagship's freight line, and he has not left the lower decks in decades. Even a short journey could sunder the spirit from his ancient body."

traits.locale_text: «El Primer Tejedor es muy anciano. Su vivienda se halla en el templo que hay bajo la línea de carga de la nave insignia, y no ha abandonado las cubiertas inferiores en décadas. Incluso un breve viaje podría separar su espíritu de su cuerpo centenario».
«El Primer Tejedor es muy anciano. No ha abandonado las cubiertas inferiores en décadas. Incluso un breve viaje podría separar su espíritu de su cuerpo centenario».

languages.text: “首席织网者已经老了。他留在旗舰货运区域下面的圣殿里，已经几十年没有离开过底层甲板了。即便是非常短暂的旅途，也可能会导致他的灵魂离开古老的躯体。”
languages.original_text: "The First Spinner is old. His abode is in the temple beneath the flagship's freight line, and he has not left the lower decks in decades. Even a short journey could sunder the spirit from his ancient body."

traits.locale_text: “首席织网者已经老了。他留在旗舰货运区域下面的圣殿里，已经几十年没有离开过底层甲板了。即便是非常短暂的旅途，也可能会导致他的灵魂离开古老的躯体。”
“最初的织网者已经老了，已经几十年没有离开过底层甲板了。即便是非常短暂的旅途，也可能会导致他的灵魂离开古老的躯体。”

languages.text: 「初代の織り手は老いぼれです。彼の住まいは旗艦の貨物線の下にある神殿で、もう何十年も、下層デッキから出ていません。彼の古代の身体では、近場への移動ですらもガタが来るでしょう」
languages.original_text: "The First Spinner is old. His abode is in the temple beneath the flagship's freight line, and he has not left the lower decks in decades. Even a short journey could sunder the spirit from his ancient body."

traits.locale_text: 「初代の織り手は老いぼれです。彼の住まいは旗艦の貨物線の下にある神殿で、もう何十年も、下層デッキから出ていません。彼の古代の身体では、近場への移動ですらもガタが来るでしょう」
「初代のウィーバーは老いぼれでいる。彼は何十年も、下層デッキから出ていない。彼の古代の身体では、短い移動さえもガタが来るだろう」

languages.text: "Der Erste Spinner ist alt. Seine Bleibe ist der Tempel unter der Frachtroute des Flaggschiffs. Er hat die Unterdecks seit Jahrzehnten nicht verlassen. Selbst eine kurze Reise könnte den Geist aus seinem uralten Körper reißen."
languages.original_text: "The First Spinner is old. His abode is in the temple beneath the flagship's freight line, and he has not left the lower decks in decades. Even a short journey could sunder the spirit from his ancient body."

traits.locale_text: "Der Erste Spinner ist alt. Seine Bleibe ist der Tempel unter der Frachtroute des Flaggschiffs. Er hat die Unterdecks seit Jahrzehnten nicht verlassen. Selbst eine kurze Reise könnte den Geist aus seinem uralten Körper reißen."
"Der Erste Weber ist alt. Er hat die Unterdecks seit Jahrzehnten nicht verlassen. Schon eine kurze Reise könnte den Geist aus seinem uralten Körper reißen."
